text: Nɨbi bɨ sawl sek, wɨdɨn koy yɨbɨl mɨdebɨm agak. Tap anɨb ak tay, tap awl yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak? Tap gol tap awl yɨbɨl akaŋ, God agnɨgep kal awl ak tap awl yɨbɨl agak? Nɨbi nepɨm, God agnɨgep kal awl ak tap awl yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak. Tap gol pen mɨdeb ak, God agnɨgep kal awl mɨgan anɨb ak tek, tap gol anɨb ak abe God tap teplep ne agak.
